pricing_notes: Prices are per seat per month, billed annually. VAT is excluded.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Get organized and set up simple sales processes quickly.
features: Lead, calendar and pipeline management
Seamless data import and 400+ integrations
Create activity, deal and contact reports with AI
Personalized onboarding

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Never miss the next step with easy-to-use email and automations.
features: Full email sync with templates, open and click tracking and group emailing
Automations builder, including email sequences
Meeting, email and video call scheduling
Live chat support

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Optimize performance with more customizations and reporting.
features: AI-powered Sales Assistant and emailing tools
Contract and proposal management with e-signatures
Streamlined lead routing and team management
Revenue forecasts and custom field reporting
Extra data entry and data quality settings

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Empower larger teams with flexible collaboration and support.
features: Project planning, tracking and delivery
Increased control of account permissions and visibilities
24/7 live chat support
Phone support

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Experience Pipedrive without limits and have ultimate peace of mind.
features: Enhanced security preferences
Unlimited reports and customizations
Maximize the number of automations and email syncs per seat

additional_fees.fee_description: VAT will be billed to EU customers in line with the applicable rates of their member state unless a valid VAT number is provided.

original_app_metadata.name: Pipedrive
original_app_metadata.description: Pipedrive is sales pipeline and CRM software for deal makers. Get super-organized. Close deals in less time. iOS and Android apps let you take your pipeline with you anywhere.
